title: 2 Euro (General Council of the Valleys)

composition.text: Bimetallic: nickel brass clad nickel centre in copper-nickel ring

obverse.description: A depiction of the upper part of the entry portal of Casa de la Vall with the coat of arms of the country. Two compact groups of human faces on both sides of the design. The coin’s outer ring depicts the 12 stars of the European flag.
obverse.lettering:
600 ANYS DEL CONSELL DE LA TERRA
ANDORRA
600
1419
2019
obverse.lettering_translation:
600 Years of the Council of the Earth
Andorra
600
1419
2019

reverse.description: A map, next to the face value, shows the European continent without borders.

commemorated_topic: 600 Years of the General Council (Consell de la Terra)
comments:
The coin commemorates the 600th anniversary of the creation of the Consell de la Terra, (Council of the Land). It was a representative body created in 1419, predecessor of the Consell General (General Council), the parliament of Andorra.

The two compact groups of human faces on both sides of the coin are meant to convey the stones of the building, meaning the cohesion of Andorrans as a social community united in history, institutions and values.
